mapper.select:
select pdor.pdorNum, pdor.pdorStatusCd, pdor.pdorTotalPrice, deli.deliSeq, deli.deliNum, deli.deliStausCd, deli.deliRegDate, deli.deliModDate, deli.deliDesc, (SELECT a.mafaNum FROM manufacture a WHERE a.productorder_pdorSeq = pdor.pdorSeq limit 1) AS mafaNum, (SELECT group_concat(a.mafaTotalQty) FROM manufacture a WHERE a.productorder_pdorSeq = pdor.pdorSeq) AS totalQtys, (SELECT SUM(pdolQty) FROM productorderlist WHERE productorder_pdorSeq = pdorSeq) AS productTotalCnt
ORDER BY deli.deliSeq DESC limit #{rowNumToShow} offset #{startRnumForMysql}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO delivery ( deliNum, deliStausCd, deliRegDate, deliDelNy, productorder_pdorSeq ) VALUE ( #{deliNum}, 16, date_format(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S'), 0, (SELECT pdorSeq FROM productorder WHERE pdorNum = #{pdorNum}) )
mapper.select:
SELECT pdor.pdorNum, pdor.pdorStatusCd, pdor.pdorTotalPrice, deli.deliSeq, deli.deliNum, deli.deliStausCd, deli.deliRegDate, deli.deliModDate, deli.deliDesc, d.dealName, (SELECT a.mafaNum FROM manufacture a WHERE a.productorder_pdorSeq = pdor.pdorSeq limit 1) AS mafaNum, (SELECT group_concat(a.mafaTotalQty) FROM manufacture a WHERE a.productorder_pdorSeq = pdor.pdorSeq) AS totalQtys, (SELECT SUM(pdolQty) FROM productorderlist WHERE productorder_pdorSeq = pdorSeq) AS productTotalCnt FROM delivery deli LEFT JOIN productorder pdor ON deli.productorder_pdorSeq = pdor.pdorSeq LEFT JOIN dealer as d on pdor.dealer_dealSeq = d.dealSeq
WHERE 1=1 AND deliSeq = #{deliSeq}
